name: LakeStar Lodge

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were in a second floor renovated room for two nights. Rooms are a little small, but ours had a fireplace and loveseat. Some have two queens instead. Very clean. Bathroom is okay size and shower head had good pressure. Re toiletries, only shampoo and soap supplied. Friends were in a yet-to-be-renovated room and the carpet was pretty ratty.
reviews.title: Lovely lake views from every balcony

reviews.text: Each room has balcony on the lake side and small fridge and microwave. Very well-done website clearly shows layout and the view for each room. Lights on either side of the bed okay for reading. Great communal patio with fire pit. Kitchen off the lobby for guest use with a stove, full fridge (get what you need out of it by 8pm when the office closes), and lots of wine glasses, plus coffee and tea.
reviews.title: Family digs need an upgrade

reviews.text: All in all, a pleasant stay in a terrific location.
reviews.title: Nice, cozy spot on the lake

reviews.text: This is actually a very well located property with lake view and water access, as well as lovely terrace with tables, chairs, umbrellas, fire pit, large grill and a well stocked kitchen area where coffee is always available. I understand, also, that many rooms have been updated. However, we were traveling with three grandchildren and reserved the three-bedroom suite. While it was relatively clean and had a small kitchen area where we could prepare breakfast and lunch, it was quite disappointing otherwise. Very, very dated, dirty carpet, tiny, inadequate bathroom. I could go on. When traveling with the kids, I like to treat them to something special and am willing to pay--which we did. This suite was no bargain and I shudder to think about what they'll charge when they clean that it up!
reviews.title: Very Relaxing

reviews.text: We had a very nice time on our three night stay at the lodge. Room and grounds were clean and well maintained. The rooms are nice, but a little on the small side. There were four of us in a room with two queens and it was a little tight, mainly because there are no dressers or closets - just a few hangers for hanging clothes. There is plenty of room to relax outside, though, with a nice lawn on the lake with comfortable chairs and two fire pits. Overall, we had a very nice stay.
reviews.title: The perfect place to get away.

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for a 3 day romantic getaway to celebrate our anniversary. We have never been to Deep Creek before so we found this place online. Enjoyed our stay emensely! Friendly, clean, great bed and room, great location and even the weather was great! We are already planning our next visit! Thanks LakeStar!
reviews.title: Loved this place!

reviews.text: A group of us stayed there this weekend in late July. We also stayed a year before. Within the year Lake Star Lodge has new owners and they have put a lot of work into rennovating the rooms. My room was great, and refreshed from the prior year. We also met the owners and they were great folks!
reviews.title: New Owners and Rennovations!

reviews.text: I would reccomend this place for further travel.
reviews.title: Ehh not too sure

reviews.text: We get hotels in deep creek at least 15 times a year. We decided to try this hotel. It was nice in a good location but there were some problems. Our balcony had bee nest issues and the room had some spider issues. They said they were taking care of it though. If they did I would definitely use this hotel every time that we go.
reviews.title: Great Lake View....Relaxing!

reviews.text: We had a nice one night stay. We rented the large 3 bedroom unit. It was clean and acceptable. The place needs updated...big time....with new beds, carpets, and painting the paneling. The bedding on the beds are WONDERFUL!! The view is great of the lake and the breezes are wonderful!!! We had a newly installed deck off the back of our unit that was great because two of the group are smokers. There was an updated fire-pit on the back of the unit with red chairs, dining tables and a grill. But...PLEASE throw away the the gray chairs...they are broken and someone is going to get hurt....mine collapsed and I hit the ground. We enjoyed ourselves and would stay again. THANKS!!
reviews.title: Wonderful Weekend Get Away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was clean and had a lovely view of the inlet of the lake. The room had not been renovated so having the sink outside of the bathroon @ the entry to the room is probably one of the renovations that wiil be made. The staff were very young adults and were, when requested, response to my gastrointestional problems. Folks staying at the Lodge were very friendly. The small poarch and lawn area gave us a cool place to sit and enjoy the breeze. I would recommend this Lodge for anyone who wants a minimal frills but clean room and comfortable bed. This is the business side of the lake so it was more commercial than the other parts of the lake. Due to dense fog on our day of departure we were unable to view the full lake and all the other activities available..
reviews.title: Stay @ Lodge when I was sick

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first time visiting Deep Creek Lake. We enjoyed the area and our stay at Lakestar Lodge. The location was perfect and I loved the fact that we were on the lake. We did not have to leave our room to watch the fireworks. We could walk to all of the local restaurants and the family fun center. The Aquatic Center was minutes from the hotel. We could not ask for a better location for lodging. The staff was accommodating and very friendly.
reviews.title: Great Location and Price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was nice and cozy. The renovations were great! However, we could not really enjoy the balony due to the numerous amount of spider/spider webs. It was clear there was an infestation of spiders which warranted an exterminator to spray periodically or housekeeping should check and knock down spider webs during daily cleanings. I would also suggest replacing the bright solar lights on the balcony with yellow bug solar lights which do not attract as many bugs.
reviews.title: Super Time

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We look forward to future visits at Lakestar Lodge.
reviews.title: Deep Creek mini vacation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the LakeStar to be cozy and comfortable with a nice view of the lake. The balcony was pleasant although mostly we used the well manicured lawn on the Lakeside with it's comfortable lawn chairs. It was fun late afternoon to watch the boats come in and feed the people friendly ducks. Good beds and friendly service. We will be back to Deep and Creek and will stay at LakeStar again.
reviews.title: great stay

reviews.text: The location was perfect close to all the activities and restaurants! Very clean hotel. The only problem was the lawn and dock area was a little over run by the ducks and the droppings! Otherwise no complaints. Will definitely stay again!
reviews.title: Well worth the value!

reviews.text: We stayed in one of the rooms not yet renovated, but it was perfectly nice! Clean, comfy beds, and a fabulous view from our own little porch. Great patio overlooking the lake with a barbeque for guest use. My only complaint was that the ducks made such a mess of the grassy area leading down to the lake - I was hesitant to walk down there. I know they can't get rid of the ducks, but a clean-up crew could help to keep the grass clear enough to walk on! Otherwise, though, a perfectly lovely stay!!
reviews.title: Loved our short stay

reviews.text: From the second we pulled in to the second we left, we loved it. Clean room. Well done renovations.
reviews.title: Amazing staff made us feel like family.

reviews.text: We chose this lodge based on website reviews and man were they right. This place is awesome. Best on the lake.
reviews.title: Small rooms but lake view was great

reviews.text: We got married on the dock adjacent to the property on Sunday afternoon. This staff and owner (Sal) went a avid and beyond to accommodate us with every single little detail we needed.
reviews.title: Very Nice

description: The LakeStar Lodge is a lakefront hotel with 20 rooms and a 3-bedroom vacation suite, located on the north side of Deep Creek Lake in western Maryland. Every room has a clear view of the lake and mountains, which feature the Wisp resort. Enjoy skiing, snow boarding, and snow tubing in the Winter, as well as 3,900 acres of lake fun -- boating, swimming, fishing, and jet-skiing -- in the Summer. For those who are more adventurous, there are numerous State parks in the area including Swallow Falls and Muddy Creek Falls with trails that run along the water and ascend the various mountains. We welcome you to Deep Creek Lake and the LakeStar Lodge.
